title: My Friend's Account got Hacked.
body:
Hey everybody,

so a friend of mine is dealing with an issue where he cannot log in to his account. he tried both the username and password recovery but the responses are not going to his email address.  when he tried to use the recover username option it goes on to state that if email doesn't work to "contact support, please login". so he can't get help because the invading party may have taken the next step and changed the Account log-in name and password...  "I" being the dutiful friend try to submit a ticket on his behalf looked at the options and for the life of me cannot find a ticket issue option that covers this unusual problem. i have no idea on how to proceed because the Help and Support does not have a report option that clearly deals with this sort of thing. Now i'm worried that he is a repeat customer for years who has essentially lost all of his skins and champions that he has paid for and accumulated over the years... A little more information on how to solve this issue please? So far i am not seeing any real actions to take to resolve this problem when there is no phone number contacts or way of getting in contact with Riot directly other than Forums.
Any info to resolve this would be appreciated.

 
Thanks,

replies.body: The best method of getting your friends account secured is to have him use the [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416). He will have to be the one to shoot us that information since he is the original creator, however.
